message: Hello Bob, I am offering you the chance to purchase my product. I believe it holds significant value, and I'm hoping we can agree on a price that benefits both of us.  I'm starting the bidding at $18,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is that something we could work with?

I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $12,000 is a fair starting point,  I'm looking to get closer to $15,000 for this product considering its unique value. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $13,500?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $13,000, but I don't think I can go any higher. Is that something we can agree on?
